text: Will HubSpot create a rollback function or an easier way to test an update on themes ie a preview sandbox or a dry run, I understand Databases don't change much in HubSpot, so I created a "dev" environment if you could call it that, but I didn't have access to the theme being used in production :confused: , would be nice if this process was more streamlined?   Also, will HubSpot allow templates from level 1 or deeper to become editable in the CMS section? I have been developing with Hubl for a few years now and say these things because it's time.

<@U02NJPSJ3QB> you could use
`hs theme preview`  to preview the theme from local dev.
One thing you could do is create a github action that will sync changes between portals(ie. production and dev)

what do you mean with "...from level 1 or deeper... editiable..."?
